saw.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a tool that you use for cutting wood. It has a flat blade with an edge cut into many V shapes.
saw.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: a short familiar phrase or sentence that is considered to contain some truth about life
saw.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: That reminds me of the old saw about being careful about what you wish for.
saw.translation[2].definitions[0].defini: to cut something using a saw
saw.translation[2].definitions[0].exampl: She was in the backyard sawing logs.
He sawed through a power cable by mistake.
